00031 TCPStateVariables::TCPStateVariables()
00032 {
00033     // set everything to 0 -- real init values will be set manually
00034     active = false;
00035     fork = false;
00036     snd_mss = -1; // will be set from configureStateVariables()
00037     snd_una = 0;
00038     snd_nxt = 0;
00039     snd_max = 0;
00040     snd_wnd = 0;
00041     snd_up = 0;
00042     snd_wl1 = 0;
00043     snd_wl2 = 0;
00044     iss = 0;
00045     rcv_nxt = 0;
00046     rcv_wnd = -1; // will be set from configureStateVariables()
00047     rcv_up = 0;
00048     irs = 0;
00049 
00050     dupacks = 0;
00051 
00052     syn_rexmit_count = 0;
00053     syn_rexmit_timeout = 0;
00054 
00055     fin_ack_rcvd = false;
00056     send_fin = false;
00057     snd_fin_seq = 0;
00058     fin_rcvd = false;
00059     rcv_fin_seq = 0;
00060     afterRto = false;
00061 }

00063 std::string TCPStateVariables::info() const
00064 {
00065     std::stringstream out;
00066     out <<  "snd_una=" << snd_una;
00067     out << " snd_nxt=" << snd_nxt;
00068     out << " snd_max=" << snd_max;
00069     out << " snd_wnd=" << snd_wnd;
00070     out << " rcv_nxt=" << rcv_nxt;
00071     out << " rcv_wnd=" << rcv_wnd;
00072     return out.str();
00073 }

00075 std::string TCPStateVariables::detailedInfo() const
00076 {
00077     std::stringstream out;
00078     out << "active = " << active << "\n";
00079     out << "snd_mss = " << snd_mss << "\n";
00080     out << "snd_una = " << snd_una << "\n";
00081     out << "snd_nxt = " << snd_nxt << "\n";
00082     out << "snd_max = " << snd_max << "\n";
00083     out << "snd_wnd = " << snd_wnd << "\n";
00084     out << "snd_up = " << snd_up << "\n";
00085     out << "snd_wl1 = " << snd_wl1 << "\n";
00086     out << "snd_wl2 = " << snd_wl2 << "\n";
00087     out << "iss = " << iss << "\n";
00088     out << "rcv_nxt = " << rcv_nxt << "\n";
00089     out << "rcv_wnd = " << rcv_wnd << "\n";
00090     out << "rcv_up = " << rcv_up << "\n";
00091     out << "irs = " << irs << "\n";
00092     out << "fin_ack_rcvd = " << fin_ack_rcvd << "\n";
00093     return out.str();
00094 }

00096 TCPConnection::TCPConnection()
00097 {
00098     // Note: this ctor is NOT used to create live connections, only
00099     // temporary ones to invoke segmentArrivalWhileClosed() on
00100     sendQueue = NULL;
00101     receiveQueue = NULL;
00102     tcpAlgorithm = NULL;
00103     state = NULL;
00104     the2MSLTimer = connEstabTimer = finWait2Timer = synRexmitTimer = NULL;
00105     sndWndVector = sndNxtVector = sndAckVector = rcvSeqVector = rcvAckVector = unackedVector = NULL;
00106 }

00112 TCPConnection::TCPConnection(TCP *_mod, int _appGateIndex, int _connId)
00113 {
00114     tcpMain = _mod;
00115     appGateIndex = _appGateIndex;
00116     connId = _connId;
00117 
00118     localPort = remotePort = -1;
00119 
00120     char fsmname[24];
00121     sprintf(fsmname, "fsm-%d", connId);
00122     fsm.setName(fsmname);
00123     fsm.setState(TCP_S_INIT);
00124 
00125 
00126     // queues and algorithm will be created on active or passive open
00127     sendQueue = NULL;
00128     receiveQueue = NULL;
00129     tcpAlgorithm = NULL;
00130     state = NULL;
00131 
00132     the2MSLTimer = new cMessage("2MSL");
00133     connEstabTimer = new cMessage("CONN-ESTAB");
00134     finWait2Timer = new cMessage("FIN-WAIT-2");
00135     synRexmitTimer = new cMessage("SYN-REXMIT");
00136 
00137     the2MSLTimer->setContextPointer(this);
00138     connEstabTimer->setContextPointer(this);
00139     finWait2Timer->setContextPointer(this);
00140     synRexmitTimer->setContextPointer(this);
00141 
00142     // statistics
00143     sndWndVector = NULL;
00144     sndNxtVector = NULL;
00145     sndAckVector = NULL;
00146     rcvSeqVector = NULL;
00147     rcvAckVector = NULL;
00148     unackedVector = NULL;
00149 
00150     if (getTcpMain()->recordStatistics)
00151     {
00152         sndWndVector = new cOutVector("send window");
00153         sndNxtVector = new cOutVector("send seq");
00154         sndAckVector = new cOutVector("sent ack");
00155         rcvSeqVector = new cOutVector("rcvd seq");
00156         rcvAckVector = new cOutVector("rcvd ack");
00157         unackedVector = new cOutVector("unacked bytes");
00158     }
00159 }

00161 TCPConnection::~TCPConnection()
00162 {
00163     delete sendQueue;
00164     delete receiveQueue;
00165     delete tcpAlgorithm;
00166     delete state;
00167 
00168     if (the2MSLTimer)   delete cancelEvent(the2MSLTimer);
00169     if (connEstabTimer) delete cancelEvent(connEstabTimer);
00170     if (finWait2Timer)  delete cancelEvent(finWait2Timer);
00171     if (synRexmitTimer) delete cancelEvent(synRexmitTimer);
00172 
00173     // statistics
00174     delete sndWndVector;
00175     delete sndNxtVector;
00176     delete sndAckVector;
00177     delete rcvSeqVector;
00178     delete rcvAckVector;
00179     delete unackedVector;
00180 }
00181 
00182 bool TCPConnection::processTimer(cMessage *msg)
00183 {
00184     printConnBrief();
00185     tcpEV << msg->getName() << " timer expired\n";
00186 
00187     // first do actions
00188     TCPEventCode event;
00189     if (msg==the2MSLTimer)
00190     {
00191         event = TCP_E_TIMEOUT_2MSL;
00192         process_TIMEOUT_2MSL();
00193     }
00194     else if (msg==connEstabTimer)
00195     {
00196         event = TCP_E_TIMEOUT_CONN_ESTAB;
00197         process_TIMEOUT_CONN_ESTAB();
00198     }
00199     else if (msg==finWait2Timer)
00200     {
00201         event = TCP_E_TIMEOUT_FIN_WAIT_2;
00202         process_TIMEOUT_FIN_WAIT_2();
00203     }
00204     else if (msg==synRexmitTimer)
00205     {
00206         event = TCP_E_IGNORE;
00207         process_TIMEOUT_SYN_REXMIT(event);
00208     }
00209     else
00210     {
00211         event = TCP_E_IGNORE;
00212         tcpAlgorithm->processTimer(msg, event);
00213     }
00214 
00215     // then state transitions
00216     return performStateTransition(event);
00217 }
00218 
00219 bool TCPConnection::processTCPSegment(TCPSegment *tcpseg, IPvXAddress segSrcAddr, IPvXAddress segDestAddr)
00220 {
00221     printConnBrief();
00222     if (!localAddr.isUnspecified())
00223     {
00224         ASSERT(localAddr==segDestAddr);
00225         ASSERT(localPort==tcpseg->getDestPort());
00226     }
00227     if (!remoteAddr.isUnspecified())
00228     {
00229         ASSERT(remoteAddr==segSrcAddr);
00230         ASSERT(remotePort==tcpseg->getSrcPort());
00231     }
00232 
00233     if (tryFastRoute(tcpseg))
00234         return true;
00235 
00236     // first do actions
00237     TCPEventCode event = process_RCV_SEGMENT(tcpseg, segSrcAddr, segDestAddr);
00238 
00239     // then state transitions
00240     return performStateTransition(event);
00241 }
00242 
00243 bool TCPConnection::processAppCommand(cMessage *msg)
00244 {
00245     printConnBrief();
00246 
00247     // first do actions
00248     TCPCommand *tcpCommand = (TCPCommand *)(msg->removeControlInfo());
00249     TCPEventCode event = preanalyseAppCommandEvent(msg->getKind());
00250     tcpEV << "App command: " << eventName(event) << "\n";
00251     switch (event)
00252     {
00253         case TCP_E_OPEN_ACTIVE: process_OPEN_ACTIVE(event, tcpCommand, msg); break;
00254         case TCP_E_OPEN_PASSIVE: process_OPEN_PASSIVE(event, tcpCommand, msg); break;
00255         case TCP_E_SEND: process_SEND(event, tcpCommand, msg); break;
00256         case TCP_E_CLOSE: process_CLOSE(event, tcpCommand, msg); break;
00257         case TCP_E_ABORT: process_ABORT(event, tcpCommand, msg); break;
00258         case TCP_E_STATUS: process_STATUS(event, tcpCommand, msg); break;
00259         default: opp_error("wrong event code");
00260     }
00261 
00262     // then state transitions
00263     return performStateTransition(event);
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 TCPEventCode TCPConnection::preanalyseAppCommandEvent(int commandCode)
00268 {
00269     switch (commandCode)
00270     {
00271         case TCP_C_OPEN_ACTIVE:  return TCP_E_OPEN_ACTIVE;
00272         case TCP_C_OPEN_PASSIVE: return TCP_E_OPEN_PASSIVE;
00273         case TCP_C_SEND:         return TCP_E_SEND;
00274         case TCP_C_CLOSE:        return TCP_E_CLOSE;
00275         case TCP_C_ABORT:        return TCP_E_ABORT;
00276         case TCP_C_STATUS:       return TCP_E_STATUS;
00277         default: opp_error("Unknown message kind in app command");
00278                  return (TCPEventCode)0; // to satisfy compiler
00279     }
00280 }
00281 
00282 bool TCPConnection::performStateTransition(const TCPEventCode& event)
00283 {
00284     ASSERT(fsm.getState()!=TCP_S_CLOSED); // closed connections should be deleted immediately
00285 
00286     if (event==TCP_E_IGNORE)  // e.g. discarded segment
00287     {
00288         tcpEV << "Staying in state: " << stateName(fsm.getState()) << " (no FSM event)\n";
00289         return true;
00290     }
00291 
00292     // state machine
00293     // TBD add handling of connection timeout event (keepalive), with transition to CLOSED
00294     // Note: empty "default:" lines are for gcc's benefit which would otherwise spit warnings
00295     int oldState = fsm.getState();
00296     switch (fsm.getState())
00297     {
00298         case TCP_S_INIT:
00299             switch (event)
00300             {
00301                 case TCP_E_OPEN_PASSIVE:FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_LISTEN); break;
00302                 case TCP_E_OPEN_ACTIVE: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_SYN_SENT); break;
00303                 default:;
00304             }
00305             break;
00306 
00307         case TCP_S_LISTEN:
00308             switch (event)
00309             {
00310                 case TCP_E_OPEN_ACTIVE: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_SYN_SENT); break;
00311                 case TCP_E_SEND:        FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_SYN_SENT); break;
00312                 case TCP_E_CLOSE:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00313                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00314                 case TCP_E_RCV_SYN:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_SYN_RCVD);break;
00315                 default:;
00316             }
00317             break;
00318 
00319         case TCP_S_SYN_RCVD:
00320             switch (event)
00321             {
00322                 case TCP_E_CLOSE:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_FIN_WAIT_1); break;
00323                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00324                 case TCP_E_TIMEOUT_CONN_ESTAB: FSM_Goto(fsm, state->active ? TCP_S_CLOSED : TCP_S_LISTEN); break;
00325                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, state->active ? TCP_S_CLOSED : TCP_S_LISTEN); break;
00326                 case TCP_E_RCV_ACK:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_ESTABLISHED); break;
00327                 case TCP_E_RCV_FIN:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSE_WAIT); break;
00328                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00329                 default:;
00330             }
00331             break;
00332 
00333         case TCP_S_SYN_SENT:
00334             switch (event)
00335             {
00336                 case TCP_E_CLOSE:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00337                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00338                 case TCP_E_TIMEOUT_CONN_ESTAB: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00339                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00340                 case TCP_E_RCV_SYN_ACK: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_ESTABLISHED); break;
00341                 case TCP_E_RCV_SYN:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_SYN_RCVD); break;
00342                 default:;
00343             }
00344             break;
00345 
00346         case TCP_S_ESTABLISHED:
00347             switch (event)
00348             {
00349                 case TCP_E_CLOSE:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_FIN_WAIT_1); break;
00350                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00351                 case TCP_E_RCV_FIN:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSE_WAIT); break;
00352                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00353                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00354                 default:;
00355             }
00356             break;
00357 
00358         case TCP_S_CLOSE_WAIT:
00359             switch (event)
00360             {
00361                 case TCP_E_CLOSE:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_LAST_ACK); break;
00362                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00363                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00364                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00365                 default:;
00366             }
00367             break;
00368 
00369         case TCP_S_LAST_ACK:
00370             switch (event)
00371             {
00372                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00373                 case TCP_E_RCV_ACK:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00374                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00375                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00376                 default:;
00377             }
00378             break;
00379 
00380         case TCP_S_FIN_WAIT_1:
00381             switch (event)
00382             {
00383                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00384                 case TCP_E_RCV_FIN:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSING); break;
00385                 case TCP_E_RCV_ACK:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_FIN_WAIT_2); break;
00386                 case TCP_E_RCV_FIN_ACK: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_TIME_WAIT); break;
00387                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00388                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00389                 default:;
00390             }
00391             break;
00392 
00393         case TCP_S_FIN_WAIT_2:
00394             switch (event)
00395             {
00396                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00397                 case TCP_E_RCV_FIN:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_TIME_WAIT); break;
00398                 case TCP_E_TIMEOUT_FIN_WAIT_2: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00399                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00400                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00401                 default:;
00402             }
00403             break;
00404 
00405         case TCP_S_CLOSING:
00406             switch (event)
00407             {
00408                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00409                 case TCP_E_RCV_ACK:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_TIME_WAIT); break;
00410                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00411                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00412                 default:;
00413             }
00414             break;
00415 
00416         case TCP_S_TIME_WAIT:
00417             switch (event)
00418             {
00419                 case TCP_E_ABORT:       FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00420                 case TCP_E_TIMEOUT_2MSL: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00421                 case TCP_E_RCV_RST:     FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00422                 case TCP_E_RCV_UNEXP_SYN: FSM_Goto(fsm, TCP_S_CLOSED); break;
00423                 default:;
00424             }
00425             break;
00426 
00427         case TCP_S_CLOSED:
00428             break;
00429     }
00430 
00431     if (oldState!=fsm.getState())
00432     {
00433         tcpEV << "Transition: " << stateName(oldState) << " --> " << stateName(fsm.getState()) << "  (event was: " << eventName(event) << ")\n";
00434         testingEV << tcpMain->getName() << ": " << stateName(oldState) << " --> " << stateName(fsm.getState()) << "  (on " << eventName(event) << ")\n";
00435 
00436         // cancel timers, etc.
00437         stateEntered(fsm.getState());
00438     }
00439     else
00440     {
00441         tcpEV << "Staying in state: " << stateName(fsm.getState()) << " (event was: " << eventName(event) << ")\n";
00442     }
00443 
00444     return fsm.getState()!=TCP_S_CLOSED;
00445 }
00446 
00447 void TCPConnection::stateEntered(int state)
00448 {
00449     // cancel timers
00450     switch (state)
00451     {
00452         case TCP_S_INIT:
00453             // we'll never get back to INIT
00454             break;
00455         case TCP_S_LISTEN:
00456             // we may get back to LISTEN from SYN_RCVD
00457             ASSERT(connEstabTimer && synRexmitTimer);
00458             cancelEvent(connEstabTimer);
00459             cancelEvent(synRexmitTimer);
00460             break;
00461         case TCP_S_SYN_RCVD:
00462         case TCP_S_SYN_SENT:
00463             break;
00464         case TCP_S_ESTABLISHED:
00465             // we're in ESTABLISHED, these timers are no longer needed
00466             delete cancelEvent(connEstabTimer);
00467             delete cancelEvent(synRexmitTimer);
00468             connEstabTimer = synRexmitTimer = NULL;
00469             // TCP_I_ESTAB notification moved inside event processing
00470             break;
00471         case TCP_S_CLOSE_WAIT:
00472         case TCP_S_LAST_ACK:
00473         case TCP_S_FIN_WAIT_1:
00474         case TCP_S_FIN_WAIT_2:
00475         case TCP_S_CLOSING:
00476         case TCP_S_TIME_WAIT:
00477             // whether connection setup succeeded (ESTABLISHED) or not (others),
00478             // cancel these timers
00479             if (connEstabTimer) cancelEvent(connEstabTimer);
00480             if (synRexmitTimer) cancelEvent(synRexmitTimer);
00481             break;
00482         case TCP_S_CLOSED:
00483             // all timers need to be cancelled
00484             if (the2MSLTimer)   cancelEvent(the2MSLTimer);
00485             if (connEstabTimer) cancelEvent(connEstabTimer);
00486             if (finWait2Timer)  cancelEvent(finWait2Timer);
00487             if (synRexmitTimer) cancelEvent(synRexmitTimer);
00488             tcpAlgorithm->connectionClosed();
00489             break;
00490     }
00491 }
